examples.input:
Which statement is sarcastic?
Options:
(A) A wave of hypothermia and drownings will be a great way to start the year
(B) A wave of hypothermia and drownings will be a terrible way to start the year

Which statement is sarcastic?
Options:
(A) conspiracy theory, sounds suspicious
(B) conspiracy theory, sounds legit

Which statement is sarcastic?
Options:
(A) Yeah the presence of those inner city criminals, and welfare leeches have truly caused me to suffer
(B) Yeah the presence of those inner city criminals, and welfare leeches have truly caused me to thrive

Which statement is sarcastic?
Options:
(A) Just like we're all better off for not spinning our own clothes, mining our own steel, and forging our own tools
(B) Just like we're all worse off for not spinning our own clothes, mining our own steel, and forging our own tools

Which statement is sarcastic?
Options:
(A) Yeah, obviously that startup has terrible support because they are just tiny indie company
(B) Yeah, obviously that megaconglomerate has terrible support because they are just tiny indie company

Which statement is sarcastic?
Options:
(A) He's such terrible relationship material when he's drunk
(B) He's such great relationship material when he's drunk

Which statement is sarcastic?
Options:
(A) Showing up for work everyday helps makes you a great lawmaker
(B) Showing up for work everyday alone makes you a great lawmaker

Which statement is sarcastic?
Options:
(A) Only first-world citizens deserve freedom
(B) Not only first-world citizens deserve freedom

Which statement is sarcastic?
Options:
(A) People never foment wars to relinquish territory
(B) People never foment wars to conquer territory

Which statement is sarcastic?
Options:
(A) Remember, his Batman score isn't the only Batman theme
(B) Remember, his Batman score is the only Batman theme

Which statement is sarcastic?
Options:
(A) I personally don't believe the 7 time felon that just got done murdering a random woman wouldn't lie
(B) I personally don't believe the 7 time felon that just got done murdering a random woman would lie

Which statement is sarcastic?
Options:
(A) That's only about $0.15 per mile for a van, perfectly reasonable fuel costs
(B) That's only about $10 per mile for a van, perfectly reasonable fuel costs

Which statement is sarcastic?
Options:
(A) It means if small businesses start struggling, the government ramps up their spending to help out
(B) It means if small businesses start struggling, the government ramps up their taxes to help out

Which statement is sarcastic?
Options:
(A) It's cultural celebration at its finest!
(B) It's cultural appropriation at its finest!

Which statement is sarcastic?
Options:
(A) Just healthy meals wouldn't cut it for his active lifestyle
(B) Just healthy meals cut it for his active lifestyle

Which statement is sarcastic?
Options:
(A) Calling a whole electorate 'morons' because they don't share the same political beliefs as you is a terrible way to win them over
(B) Calling a whole electorate 'morons' because they don't share the same political beliefs as you is a great way to win them over

Which statement is sarcastic?
Options:
(A) Wow, you only applied to 200 internships this past week?
(B) Wow, you only applied to 2 internships this past week?

Which statement is sarcastic?
Options:
(A) Bought the stock at $10.50 and sold at $100. Such profits being made
(B) Bought the stock at $1050 and sold at $100. Such profits being made

Which statement is sarcastic?
Options:
(A) Just like Hitler. A True warrior
(B) Just like Hitler. A True demagogue
